          <title>
            <string language="en">Gas exchange at the alveoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasaustausch an den Alveolen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échange de gaz aux alvéoles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Troca do gás nos alveoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio di gas agli alveoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέριο ανταλλαγή στα φατνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intercambio del gas en los alvéolos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the alveoli wrapped with blood capillary and the gas exchange that happens at the alveolus.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Alveoli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alveolus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capillary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas exchange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Respiratory system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">windpipe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Alveolen, die mit 
Blutkapillare und dem Gasaustausch, der, aufgewickelt werden an der 
Alveole geschieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les alvéoles 
enveloppés avec le capillaire de sang et l'échange de gaz qui se 
produit à l'alvéole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os alveoli envolvidos 
com capilar do sangue e a troca do gás que acontece no alveolus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli alveoli spostati 
con il vaso capillare di anima e lo scambio di gas che accade 
all'alveolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα φατνία που τυλίγονται 
με το τριχοειδές αγγείο αίματος και αέριο ανταλλάξτε που 
συμβαίνει στο φατνίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los alvéolos envueltos 
con el tubo capilar de la sangre y el intercambio del gas que sucede 
en el alvéolo.</string>
          </description>
